## NotificationMessageService.getNotificationMessageComponent() method

Gets component type used for displaying notification message

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getNotificationMessageComponent(type: NotificationType): Type<NotificationMessage<TCssClasses, TOptions>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | <code>NotificationType</code> | Type of notification that should be displayed |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Type<NotificationMessage<TCssClasses, TOptions>>`
